summary: The Monkees were an American pop rock band formed in the 1960s. They became famous through their TV show and had big hits like "Last Train to Clarksville" and "I'm a Believer." At first, professional musicians made their music, but the band members took control in 1967. The group broke up in 1970 but reunited later. After the deaths of two members, Micky Dolenz and Michael Nesmith did a final tour in 2021. Now, Dolenz is the only surviving member.
title: The Monkees
